headline: SunPower National Battery Storage Initiative
summary: With Palmetto LightReach, The Cool Down, and Enphase EnergyOREM, Utah, Jan. 29, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- SunPower (herein “SunPower,” the “Company,” or Nasdaq: “SPWR”), a solar technology, services, and installation company, today announced a strategic initiative to make home battery storage more accessible to American families.
